      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_94238</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A circuit using copper wire connectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Stromkreis mit kupfernen Leitung Steckern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un circuit à l'aide des connecteurs de cuivre de
fil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um circuito usando os conectores de cobre do fio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un circuito per mezzo dei connettori di rame del 
legare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύκλωμα που χρησιμοποιεί τους συνδέσμους καλωδίων
χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un circuito usando los conectores de cobre del 
alambre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing that current will go though a copper wire if it is used as circuit connector. The copper wire is a conductor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Conductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">connector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Insulator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
zeigen, daß Strom zwar eine kupferne Leitung geht, wenn er als 
Stromkreisstecker benutzt wird. Die kupferne Leitung ist ein 
Leiter.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations prouvant que
le courant ira cependant un fil de cuivre s'il est utilisé comme 
connecteur de circuit. Le fil de cuivre est un conducteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram que 
a corrente irá though um fio de cobre se for usada como o conector do
circuito. O fio de cobre é um condutor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
indicano che la corrente andrà comunque un legare di rame se è usata
come connettore del circuito. Il legare di rame è un 
conduttore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι το ρεύμα 
θα πάει αν και ένα καλώδιο χαλκού εάν χρησιμοποιείται ως 
σύνδεσμος κυκλωμάτων. Το καλώδιο χαλκού είναι ένας 
αγωγός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que muestran
que irá la corriente sin embargo un alambre de cobre si se utiliza 
como conector del circuito. El alambre de cobre es un conductor.</string>
          </description>
